title: Understanding Disorganized Attachment
text: Disorganized attachment is a type of insecure attachment. It is important to understand the behavior of caregivers and how it affects children.

title: Characteristics of Disorganized Attachment
text: Consider how inconsistent or unpredictable behavior in caregivers might lead to confusion and fear in children.

hintAnswer: a type of insecure attachment characterized by inconsistent or unpredictable behavior in caregivers, leading to confusion and fear in children
title: Identifying Disorganized Attachment
text: Which of the following best describes disorganized attachment?
choices: a type of insecure attachment characterized by a need for closeness and intimacy but with a persistent fear of rejection or abandonment
a type of insecure attachment characterized by inconsistent or unpredictable behavior in caregivers, leading to confusion and fear in children
a type of insecure attachment characterized by a need for independence and discomfort with intimacy and closeness
The presence of two or more distinct personality states, with a disconnection in the individual’s sense of self and actions
